original_text: They are to stay in that city until they have stood trial before the assembly and until the death of the high priest who is serving at that time. Then they may go back to their own home in the town from which they fled.”
korean_text: 그 살인자는 회중 앞에 서서 재판을 받기까지 또는 그 당시 대제사장이 죽기까지 그 성읍에 거주하다가 그 후에 그 살인자는 그 성읍 곧 자기가 도망하여 나온 자기 성읍 자기 집으로 돌아갈지니라 하라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: They are to stay in that city
until they have stood trial before the assembly
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 회중 앞에서 재판을 받을 때까지

sentences.original_text: and until the death of the high priest
who is serving at that time
to their own home in the town
